title: ISA
content: my score is in 20s in my isa1 how much i should score in isa 2 and esa to get 9.0cgpa

comments.body:
First of all , get realistic goals
Not saying 9 is impossible but it will take extreme consistency 
Assuming your score is 20 in each sub , you'll need to get 30-35 ish in every subject in isa 2 and 80+ in ESA to get 9 cg

But don't overbear yourself , a gpa of 7/8 will still be pushable to 9 if you work properly every sem
sry it was typo i actually wanted to tell 8cgpa not 9
i will be happy if i get 8 typo:9
for placements will they consider the avg of all cgpa?
shouldn't it be 30-35 in isa2 and 90+in ESA??

Well , 9 is an A grade in every subject , that is an aggregate score of 80+/100 , if you get 35 in isa 2 , 20 in Isa 1 , 10 in assignment and 82 in esa your score will be 81/100 which is an A grade. In every subject that will total to 9 sgpa

Aw dawg chill man. I got 20 20 in both ISA and still ended up with 8 , but that was because I got S in python so I could afford not studying mechanics.

Don't get too relaxed tho. Try getting 30+. Some of us realise too late that it's not actually that hard to get 25+ , you don't have to be some genius , it's purely a matter of consistency in PES
what?? 20 on 40 will be 10 and 35 will be 17,10 from assignment and let's say 90 in ESA so that will be 82 so s grade right??
